text: I embarked on my developer journey with a 2-year apprenticeship as a full-stack developer at Trèfle Applications, a subsidiary of the Groupe Trèfle. My primary responsibility was maintaining the main internal website of the Groupe Trèfle, which integrated the functionalities of an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and a Customer Relationship Management (CRM). Both systems were created and developed from scratch by Trèfle Applications.

Afterward, I embarked on a 1-year apprenticeship as a full-stack developer at Run Services, an insurance brokerage subsidiary of AXA. My primary mission was to modernize the API development process. I had the opportunity to completely overhaul the existing API system. It was noted that all Run Services websites utilized the same client form, thus I was tasked with standardizing their usage of a unified API. Additionally, I implemented web services alongside the API to handle specific information such as price calculations or customer file acceptance.
Finally, I had the opportunity to work at Solutec as a consultant for Orange Cyberdefense for the last two and a half years.
